review: I recently underwent  full mouth dental implants with Dr Urvi Ashar . Being a diabetic patient with a history of bypass surgery i was properly guided and informed about the procedure.I am finally happy to have all my teeth back so that I can enjoy my food now. The whole procedure was painfree and safely done. I would definitely recommend anyone to visit her for dental implants.

I will definitely recommend to others who have dental problem.

review: I had a fantastic experience at Roots Dental Clinic where I received a root canal and dental fillings. The consultation was informative, the wait time was minimal, and the services were affordable. The staff was friendly and always smiling. Thank you for the excellent care Dr. Urvi Ashar!

review:
I was under the treatment of Dr.Urvi Ashar. She's an extremely pleasant and a wonderful dr. She patiently,
carefully & in detail explained my treatment to me & all the procedures under her were very meticulously planned. Shenput me at ease when ever I had a little discomfort which was actually very rare during her treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Got cleaning and fillings done at the Roots Dental Clinic. It was a seamless, timely and extremely comfortable experience. Dr Menaz and Dr Urvi have been honest, patient in explaining issues in detail. Most importantly, they haven't really pushed unnecessary procedures like other clinics that I have experienced. Recommend this clinic for all dental related issues.
